ghost

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • PApplet
      • ghost.App

  • public class App
extends PApplet
    Subclass of PApplet used to run the game with processing.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Load all the images and fonts in the game, and calls the gameManager.setUp() function.

      • settings

        public void settings()

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Called on every frame of the game. Calls the gameManager.tick() function which runs all the logic for one frame and draws all the objects in one frame.

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Register key presses by the player and sends it to the GameManager object.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
